attributes.action: Review DVSA practical test booking website, and increase security against bots
attributes.additional_details:
Most learners are students or those trying to get a job, both of which become a lot harder when you don’t have a car. 
The government is aware of how hard it is for young people right now to get employed, this is made a lot harder when they can’t drive.
Most learners do not have to money to pay for the extortionate prices of resold tests and get lessons. 
This is one step towards fixing the current difficulties that young people face in the UK today.
attributes.background: Make serious changes to the DVSA practical test booking website to get rid of bots that book tests immediately, which are then resold for extortionate prices that most learners cannot pay for

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/736594
